title: Pixel phone freezes during startup
content:
Since a couple of days I can't startup my Pixel device as it will freeze about 10-20sec in; the screen will freeze, become unresponsive and the only thing that still works is forcibly turning the device off by holding the power button for 30s. I can't get into the setting menu or anything like that, as it will freeze before that. I am however able to get into recovery mode, issue doesn't seem to impact there.

I've tried:
- Safe mode; still freezes at start up
- Factory reset; still no result
- Sideload the latest OTA update; again stuck at start up

Hope that anyone has any other suggestions?
